name: zkcopy-vault-proofs
description: Zero-knowledge proof system for trading performance verification

scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup trading_proof.r1cs pot12_final.ptau trading_proof_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute trading_proof_0000.zkey trading_proof_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey trading_proof_0001.zkey verification_key.json

author: zkCopyVault Team
